metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000654 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description:
GNU Libtasn1-4.13 libtasn1-4.13 version libtasn1-4.13, libtasn1-4.12contains a DoS, specifically CPU usage will reach 100% when runningasn1Paser against the POC due to an issue in_asn1_expand_object_id(p_tree), after a long time, the program will bekilled. This attack appears to be exploitable via parsing a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000654` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtasn1-6 - 4.18.0-4
libtasn1-bin - 4.18.0-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.18.0-4').
